Name: Glock 19X gen5 9x19
Description: The Glock 19X is the civilian version of Glock's entry to the XM17 Modular Handgun System competition for the US Military. It features a Glock 19 slide with a Glock 17 frame in coyote color instead of the regular black color the Glock usually comes in. Compatible with all glock 17 parts.
